Ipswich Mobile Library Route 6

Contact us:

Managers: Andrew Little and David Cook

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 263838

Route timetable

Route 6 Town/village Location Time
MIP/6A Chelsworth The Peacock 0945 – 1000
MIP/6B Chelsworth Playing Field 1005 – 1020
MIP/6C Monks Eleigh The Green 1025 – 1050
MIP/6D Brent Eleigh Village Hall 1055 – 1115
MIP/6E Kettlebaston Village Hall 1125 – 1140
MIP/6F Hitcham White Horse 1145 – 1200
MIP/6G Hitcham Village Hall 1205 – 1220
MIP/6H Hitcham The Causeway 1225 – 1240
MIP/6I Hitcham Bird Street 1245 – 1300
MIP/6J Bildeston Brooksfield 1410 – 1425
MIP/6K Bildeston Market Square 1430 – 1445
MIP/6L Bildeston Newberry Road 1450 – 1505
MIP/6M Bildeston Paddock Way 1510 – 1600

Calling every 4 weeks on Wednesdays:

2016: 20 January, 17 February, 16 March, 13 April, 11 May, 8 June, 6 July, 3 August, 31 August, 28 September, 26 October, 23 November, 21 December

2017: 18 January
